teamRules.confirmDeleteRule: Are you sure you want to delete the rule "{ruleName}"?
teamRules.fail: Error when trying to update rules.
teamRules.nameMandatory: Please provide a name for this rule
teamRules.ruleRegexHintLink: Click here to read more about regular expressions.
teamRules.similarImagesHint: Enter a percentage between 1 and 100. A distance of 100% will only relate identical images. A distance of 1% will relate images that are not so similar.
teamRules.similarTitlesHint: Enter a percentage between 1 and 100. A distance of 100% will only relate items with identical titles. A distance of 1% will relate items whose titles share very few words together.
teamRules.title: Rules
